檦檦檦

檦字的基本解释

檦
biāo
古同“标”，一种柱子。

檦
biǎo
古同“表”，用作标记的柱子：“列檦建旌。”

檦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biǎo］
［《正字通》比矯切］
亦作“1”。
(1)表记。
(2)柱。详“檦枺”。

檦字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檦； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页557第27
【篇海】方小切，音表。表也。【北魏書·禮志】爲方陳鹵簿，列步騎，內外四重，列檦建旌。　又【淮南子·本經訓】檦枺欂櫨，以相支持。【註】檦，枺柱類。　又人名。【後魏·李訢傳】趙郡范檦。

檦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
檦字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Tumble
biāo
The ancient "standard" is a kind of pillar.
Tumble
biǎo
In ancient times, the "table", the pillar used as a mark: "Lie Lu Jian Jing."
Tumble
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biǎo］
["Zhengzitong" is better than corrective cut]
Also known as "1".
(1) Representation.
(2) Column. Detailed "Lin Ming".
Tumble
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檦; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 557 27
[Pianhai] Fang Xiaoqie, sound table. Table also. [Book of the Northern Wei Dynasty·Let's Records] It is a book of Fang Chen halogen, riding step by step, quadruple inside and outside, and Jian Jing in column.　[Huainanzi·Ben Jingxun] Lianmin Lian Lian, with support. [Note] Luan, Mingzhu class.　Another name. [Post Wei·Li Xin Biography] Zhao Jun Fan Lu.
